title: Old Judge w/ Strawbridge & Clothier(Macy's Dep Store), Back Sticker - SOLD -
author: DixieBaseball

posts.post_title: Old Judge w/ Strawbridge & Clothier(Macy's Dep Store), Back Sticker - SOLD -
Macy's?? 100 year after is not "former" it's "later"
posts.post_content:
Your use of Macy's makes me laugh.

Since Topps bought Bowman in 1956, does that make 1952 Bowman cards "former Topps cards"?

Your analogy would work better for something with a Macy's sticker (not a stamp) that could be described as "formerly Strawbridge & Clothier".

Still a cool card, best of luck with the sale.

Thanks Doug!  I am here to entertain and you are here to help me edit my listings!  We make a great team!!  Appreciate it, hobby friend!  I have some other stuff for sale if you see anything else that needs updating. LOL
